item.description:
*FOR NEW MEMBERS ONLY*

Summer is officially here! There are a lot of you who are new to the group (or have joined but never made an event), and this is a great way for you to find out about our nightlife events and to meet other new members.


Bar Lola has great atmosphere and they serve a wonderful selection of tapas, along with wine and sangria, of course! This will be a very laid back, no agenda meetup - just good drinks (and food!) with good people.


To get the most out of the nightlife group, I *STRONGLY* recommend new members to attend! Also, feel free to bring a friend or two, and we will see you SUNDAY!


DETAILS: Meeting time is 5pm at Bar Lola, and the event will last until 8pm. If you come after 7pm, be sure to give me a call. If the weather is good, we will probably sit outside on the patio. If not, then we will be inside the bar area. If you have any problems finding the group, give me a call.


FIND THE ORGANIZER: My picture is located on the left-hand side of the site. For help/questions, my cell: 646.541.0708.


Bar Lola is a Spanish Tapas Restaurant/Lounge located at 160 Comm Ave, on the corner of Dartmouth St. It is located 5 minutes from the Copley Square T station on the Green Line. You will need to walk downstairs to enter the restaurant. It's Sunday, so there is free metered parking on the side streets... if you are lucky!

If you plan to have drinks and food, be sure to bring extra cash to for easier bill paying.


*FOR NEW MEMBERS ONLY*

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: New Member Meetup - Loungin with Wine and Tapas on Sunday
